question: A number, when divided by 119, leaves a remainder of 19. If it is divided by 17, it will leave a remainder of :
explanation:
On dividing the given number by 119, let k be the quotient and 19 as remainder.
Then, number = 119k + 19
$latex = 17\\times 7k+17\\times 1+2$
$latex = 17\\left ( 7k+1 \\right )+2$
Hence, the given number when divided by 17, gives (7k + 1) as quotient and 2 as remainder. Hence option [A] is right answer.
